long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Assistive24 is a comprehensive web accessibility extension that enhances browsing experience through customizable assistive technology features:

Key Features:
- Screen Reader with real-time word highlighting
- Voice Navigation for hands-free browsing
- Visual Adjustments (contrast, text size, spacing)
- Reading Tools (guide mask, line reader)
- Specialized Fonts (OpenDyslexic, high legibility options)
- Visual Comfort Settings (dimmed screen, blue light filter, saturation control)

Accessibility Profiles for:
- Visual Impairments (low vision, color blindness, glaucoma)
- Cognitive Needs (ADHD, dyslexia, autism)
- Motor Challenges (Parkinson's, tremors)
- Neurological Conditions (seizure prevention, migraine support)

Features can be used individually or combined to create custom accessibility profiles. All adjustments can be easily reset with a single click.
